scripts.install:meteor: cd meteor && meteor --version && meteor npm install
scripts.meteor:run: cd meteor && meteor npm run start
scripts.validate:release: yarn install && yarn build:packages && yarn validate:release:packages && yarn validate:release:meteor
scripts.validate:release:meteor: cd meteor && meteor npm run validate:prod-dependencies && meteor npm run license-validate && meteor npm run lint && meteor npm run test
scripts.validate:release:packages: cd packages && yarn validate:dependencies && yarn lint && yarn unit
